import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPlay } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import './style.css' const FeaturedMovie = (props) => { return (

{`${props.movie.name}`}

{`${props.movie.vote_average} ponto${props.movie.vote_average <=1 ? '': 's'}`}

{`${props.movie.first_air_date.substring(0, 4)}`}

{`${props.movie.number_of_seasons} temporadas`}

{`${props.movie.overview}`}

) } export default FeaturedMovie
